parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear liftgate hinge can cause the liftgate to fall, potentially injuring individuals or causing damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The liftgate hinge breaks or fractures
causing the liftgate to fall or become stuck
and may result in injuries or damage to the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the rear liftgate can cause the liftgate to shatter or fall, potentially injuring individuals or causing damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Cracks appear on the rear liftgate
and may progress to the point of shattering or breaking off.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress through Driver's Side Door/ Roof
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress through the driver's side door/roof can cause damage to the vehicle's electrical systems and interior, leading to costly repairs.
symptoms: Water enters the vehicle through the driver's side door/roof
causing flooding of the floorboard and potentially damaging electrical systems and interior components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the rear hatch panel can cause the panel to break off and potentially injure individuals or cause damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Cracks appear on the rear hatch panel
and may progress to the point of breaking off.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Rusting and Paint Bubbling on Rear Quarter Panel
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature rusting and paint bubbling on the rear quarter panel can lead to structural damage and compromise the vehicle's safety.
symptoms: Rusting and paint bubbling appear on the rear quarter panel

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Transmission failure can cause the vehicle to lose power, jerk, or slip while driving, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: and warning lights on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Clutch and hydraulic system failure can cause the clutch pedal to stick to the floor, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: clutch pedal sticks to the floor
delayed or sudden loss of pressure

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Front Differential Mount Carrier Bushings Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Front differential mount carrier bushings failure can cause the front end to lock up, leading to accidents or loss of control.
Rear liftgate issues can cause the gate to open or close unexpectedly, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Rear liftgate opens or closes unexpectedly
and cracking or breaking of the liftgate.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Shifter and Column Mounted Gearshift Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Shifter and column mounted gearshift issues can cause the vehicle to shift unexpectedly, leading to accidents or loss of control.

The failure of the cruise control system can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to a loss of power steering and power brakes, which can result in hazardous driving situations and potential accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls while using cruise control
check engine light and battery light come on.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to a loss of power steering and power brakes, which can result in hazardous driving situations and potential accidents.
symptoms: check engine light and battery light come on

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power window system can cause inconvenience and discomfort to the driver and passengers.
symptoms: paint coming off the roof and doors.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake light safety switch can cause the brake lights to malfunction, leading to potential accidents and safety risks.
The failure of the rearview mirror can cause inconvenience and discomfort to the driver.
symptoms: Rearview mirror becomes inoperative when the DVD/television set is engaged.
